parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical charging system can cause fires, smoke, and damage to the vehicle and charging equipment, posing a risk to the driver and others.
symptoms: The vehicle starts smoking while charging
the charger and charge port melt
the vehicle is engulfed in flames
the 12V battery fails
and there is an unpleasant smell inside the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the 12V battery can cause the vehicle to become disabled, leaving the driver stranded, and potentially cause a safety risk if the vehicle is unable to operate properly.
symptoms: The 12V battery fails every year
the battery is bloated
steaming vapor
and very hot
the vehicle will not start
and the battery voltage is low.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The Bluetooth connectivity issue can cause distractions while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: There is an echo of the caller's voice when using the Bluetooth connection to make or receive calls
the person inside the vehicle does not hear the echo
but the person on the other end of the call does.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the intermediate shaft steering column can cause the vehicle to veer off course, making it difficult to maintain control, especially at high speeds, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering feels "sticky"
the vehicle zig-zags or wanders
the vehicle veers into other lanes
requiring constant vigilance to remain in lane.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electronic Stability Control (ESC) and Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ESC and ABS systems can cause the vehicle to lose traction and control, especially during hard braking or on inclined surfaces, which can lead to accidents, especially in rainy conditions.
symptoms: The vehicle skids or loses control
the traction control light illuminates
the brakes lock up during hard braking
the vehicle is unable to climb inclined driveways.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the active flap system can cause the vehicle to go into limp mode, leading to a loss of power and acceleration, which can create dangerous situations, especially when merging or accelerating from a stop.
symptoms: The active flap system light comes on
the vehicle goes into limp mode
loss of power and acceleration
inability to speed up when needed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration of the vehicle in reverse gear can cause accidents, injuries, and property damage, especially in parking lots or low-speed areas.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates unexpectedly when shifting into reverse gear
loss of control over the vehicle
inability to stop the vehicle.
